mapper.insert: insert into lodgment (lodg_type, lodg_name, lodg_rg, lodg_addr, lodg_img_filename, lodg_img_filepath, lodg_img_uuid, lodg_ph, lodg_content, bn_id) values (#{lodg_type}, #{lodg_name}, #{lodg_rg}, #{lodg_addr}, #{lodg_img_filename}, #{lodg_img_filepath}, #{lodg_img_uuid}, #{lodg_ph}, #{lodg_content}, 'admin')
mapper.update: update lodgment set lodg_type=#{lodg_type}, lodg_name=#{lodg_name}, lodg_rg=#{lodg_rg}, lodg_addr=#{lodg_addr}, lodg_img_filename=#{lodg_img_filename}, lodg_img_filepath=#{lodg_img_filepath}, lodg_img_uuid=#{lodg_img_uuid}, lodg_ph=#{lodg_ph}, lodg_content=#{lodg_content} where lodg_num = #{lodg_num}
